issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Android and iOS both support the textid property on Ti.UI.Label.
Could we get the same feature on Windows?

comments.body:
Hello,

Thanks for creating the ticket. Our engineering team will look into it. This need to be cleared by our selection committee. Please understand that the processes is a bit time-consuming and lots of variables in play. We will let you know if and when we will be including this feature in our platform.

Regards
